SEARCH
Package com.accoladehq.calendar.service

Interface BookingService

All Known Implementing Classes:
BookingServiceImpl
public interface BookingService
Service interface for managing calendar bookings, availability, and appointments.

Provides methods for:

  • Managing calendar owners
  • Setting availability rules
  • Searching for available time slots
  • Booking appointments
  • Listing upcoming appointments

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String>
    addAvailability(AvailabilityRequest req)
    Adds availability for a calendar owner.
    SlotDto
    bookAppointment(BookRequest req)
    Books an appointment for the specified slot.
    List<Appointment>
    listUpcoming(String username)
    Lists all upcoming appointments for a given calendar owner.
    List<SlotDto>
    searchAvailableSlots(SearchSlotsRequest req)
    Searches for available slots for a given owner and date.
    void
    upsertOwnerIfNotExists(String username, String displayName)
    Creates or updates a calendar owner if it does not already exist.

  • Method Details

    • upsertOwnerIfNotExists

      void upsertOwnerIfNotExists(String username, String displayName)
      Creates or updates a calendar owner if it does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      username - the unique username of the owner
      displayName - the display name for the owner (can be the same as username if null)

    • addAvailability

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addAvailability(AvailabilityRequest req)
      Adds availability for a calendar owner.
      Parameters:
      req - the availability request containing username, start time, and end time
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a success or failure message

    • searchAvailableSlots

      List<SlotDto> searchAvailableSlots(SearchSlotsRequest req)
      Searches for available slots for a given owner and date.
      Parameters:
      req - the search request containing username and date
      Returns:
      a list of SlotDto representing available slots

    • bookAppointment

      SlotDto bookAppointment(BookRequest req) throws IllegalStateException
      Books an appointment for the specified slot.
      Parameters:
      req - the booking request containing username, date, start time, and invitee details
      Returns:
      the booked slot details as a SlotDto
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the slot is already booked or unavailable

    • listUpcoming

      List<Appointment> listUpcoming(String username)
      Lists all upcoming appointments for a given calendar owner.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the calendar owner
      Returns:
      a list of Appointment sorted by date and start time
